GSP31jaymangu:6: prekṣāvanto 'nukte prayojane na kvacitpravartanta iti prayojanamucyate tattvajñānānmokṣaḥ tattvāni pañcaviṃśatiḥ / tathā coktam -
GSP31jaymangu:8: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vāpi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:9: teṣu ca ṣaṣṭitantrādikhyāteṣviti / vistaratvāt ṣaṣṭitantrasya saṃkṣiptarucisattvānugrahārthaṃ saptatikārambhaḥ / vakṣyati ca 'etadāryābhiḥ saṃkṣiptam';
GSP31jaymangu:10: iti / mokṣeṇa kiṃ phalamiti cedduḥkhanivṛttiḥ / atattvajño duḥkhairabhihanyamānassaṃsarannāste / tattvajñānāttu kaivalyamāpnoti,
GSP31jaymangu:11: na duḥkhairabhihanyate / hanyamānena ko heturjijñāsitavya ityatrāha-
GSP31jaymangu:17: tatra yadbhavati tadādhyātmikam / śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ceti / tatra vātapittaśleṣmaṇāṃ vaiṣamyeṇa jvarādiduḥkham,
GSP31jaymangu:18_0: taccharīre bhavatīti śārīram / yatkāmakrodhaśokādibhiḥ manasi duḥkhaṃ tanmānasam /
GSP31jaymangu:18_2: grahāveśādīni daivānyadhikṛtya bhavati tadādhidaivikamiti / etadduḥkhatrayam / tenābhighātātpīḍanāddhetorjijñāsā
GSP31jaymangu:20: iti / avaghātayatyapanayatītyavaghātakaḥ / tasya duḥkhatrayasyāvaghātakastadavaghātakaḥ / tṛjakābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:22_0: iti na bhavati / kena khalvimāni duḥkhānyutpadyanta iti tadavaghātako heturjijñāsyo
GSP31jaymangu:22_1: bhavati / duḥkhavānahametatpratīkāramanveṣayāmīti prāyovādaḥ / sa ca pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānānnānya
GSP31jaymangu:24: iti / syādetat yadi dṛṣṭastadavaghātako heturna syāt / yāvadādhyātmikasya śārīraduḥkhasyāpanayane cikitsāśāstravihita evopāyo 'sti,
GSP31jaymangu:25: mānasasyāpi saṃkhyānabalaṃ ramyāśca śabdādayo viṣayāḥ / ādhibhautikādhidaivikayorapi,
GSP31jaymangu:27: tayoḥ satpratipakṣatvāt / tatrādhidaivikasya sāmadāmabhedadaṇḍopāyaghaṭitārambhāḥ / ādhibhautikasyāpi nipātapratipātasaṃvṛtapradeśāśrayaṇādayaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:28: tataśca dṛṣṭe hetau sati jijñāsā 'smin viṣaye nirarthaketyāśaṅkyāha- 'naikāntātyantato 'bhāvāt'; iti / nā 'pārthā,
GSP31jaymangu:29_0: sārthikaiva / kutaḥ- ekāntataḥ ekāntātyantato 'bhāvādapi / ekāntenātyantena ca duḥkhābhāvasyābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:29_1: dṛṣṭe hyupāye kriyamāṇe 'pi keṣāṃcidduḥkhatrayaṃ bhavatyeveti naikāntenopaśamaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:39: vyapagatamṛtyavo jātāḥ / 'aganma jyotiḥ'; iti / jyotiḥ svargo 'yam,
GSP31jaymangu:41: iti / iyanto devā asmin svarga iti jñātavantaḥ jñānamasmākamutpannamityarthaḥ / 'kimasmān kṛṇavat';
GSP31jaymangu:42: iti / kṛṇavanmṛtyurucyate / asmān somapānān kiṃ mṛtyuḥ kariṣyate / arātiḥ vyādhiḥ so 'pi,
GSP31jaymangu:49: / tatra bhavo heturānuśravikaḥ / adhyātmādiḥ / dṛṣṭena tulyo dṛṣṭavat / tasyāpi doṣadarśanāt //
GSP31jaymangu:54: ityatiśayayuktaḥ / tathāhi- yaḥ kratuśatena yajate tasya mahadaiśvaryam,
GSP31jaymangu:55: yo dvābhyāṃ tribhirvā tasyālpamiti / tasmādānuśraviko 'pi dṛṣṭavatparityājyaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:57: iti / dṛṣṭānuśravikadvārā yo viparītaḥ tattvajñānākhyaḥ sa śreyān / tasya akaivalyaprāpakatvāt / tatraikāntātyantato 'bhāvāddṛṣṭācchreyān / śarīrahānāddhi śuddhaphalaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:61: iti / rāśitrayeṇa pañcaviṃśatitattvāni kathyante / tatra mahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ trayoviṃśatiprakāraṃ vyaktamucyate,
GSP31jaymangu:62: tena rūpeṇa pradhānasya vyaktatvāt / avyaktaṃ pradhānam,
GSP31jaymangu:63: kenacidrūpeṇāvyaktatvāt / jānātīti jñaḥ puruṣaḥ / teṣu yadvijñānaṃ svarūpaparicchedaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:64: tasmāt prāpyata ityarthaḥ / tanvādi hi paricchidya tadabhyāsāduttarakālaṃ prakṛtipuruṣāntarajñānamutpadyate,
GSP31jaymangu:65: tataśca kaivalyamiti / asyā āryāyā vakṣyamāṇā yāḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:72: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro, na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ // ISk_3 //
GSP31jaymangu:74: ityādi / prakṛtiḥ pradhānam / prakriyata utpadyate pradhānāt asyā iti prakṛtiḥ / mūlaṃ ca tatprakṛtiśceti mūlaprakṛtiḥ / saptānāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ mūlamādyaṃ kāraṇamityarthaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:76: iti / na vikriyata ityavikṛtiḥ / na kutaścidutpādyata ityarthaḥ / etatprathamaṃ tattvam //
GSP31jaymangu:78: iti / mahān buddhissa ādyo yāsāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ tāstathoktāḥ / prakṛtayaśca vikṛtayaśceti prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ / tatra mahānahaṅkāraṃ janayan prakṛtiḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:79: mahata utpadyamāno vikṛtiḥ / tanmātrāṇi śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ pañca yathākramamākāśavāyvagnyudakapṛthivyākhyāni bhūtāni janayantaḥ prakṛtayaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:81: 'ṣoḍaśakaśca vikāraḥ'; iti / ṣoḍaśa parimāṇamasyeti ṣoḍaśakaḥ / pañca buddhīndriyāṇi,
GSP31jaymangu:84: pañca mahābhūtānītyayaṃ ṣoḍaśako gaṇaḥ / cakāra evakārārthaḥ / vikāro vikṛtireva / (nāsmāt kiñcidutpadyata ityarthaḥ / etāni ṣoḍaśa tattvāni) /
GSP31jaymangu:86: iti / puraṃ śarīraṃ tasmin vasatīti puruṣaḥ / nairukto 'travidhiḥ / tasmānna kiñcidutpadyata iti na prakṛtiḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:87: niṣkriyatvāt / nāpyayaṃ kutaścidutpadyata iti na vikṛtiḥ, anāditvāt // 3 //
GSP31jaymangu:95: ityādi / dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣam / anumīyate yena tadanumānam / āptaḥ kṣīṇadoṣastena yaducyate tadāptavacanam / āgamaḥ / etat trividhaṃ pramāṇamiṣṭam //
GSP31jaymangu:96: nanu cānyānyapi pratibhādīni pramāṇāni santi tadyathā-
GSP31jaymangu:99: asmin pūrvapakṣa āha- 'sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāt'; iti / sarveṣāṃ pratibhādīnāṃ pramāṇānāṃ siddhatvāt,
GSP31jaymangu:100: trividha evāntarbhāvādityarthaḥ / tatra grāme nagare vā vartata iti pratibhotpannā / tatra yadā kṣīṇadoṣasya,
GSP31jaymangu:101: tadābhijñaprāptatvāt pratyakṣameva / tasyākṣīṇadoṣasya vitathatvādapramāṇam / yāpyarthāvisaṃvādinī kādācitkā,
GSP31jaymangu:102: sāpi kādācitkādeva nimittādutpadyamānānumānameva na pramāṇāntaram / 'gauriva gavayaḥ';
GSP31jaymangu:103: ityaupamyam / tatra gavayamajānānaḥ kaścidāptaṃ pṛcchati 'kīdṛśo gavayaḥ',
GSP31jaymangu:105: iti / tadetadāptavacanameva na pramāṇāntaram / yadāpi labdhopadeśo gavayaṃ paśyati,
GSP31jaymangu:106: tadāpi gavi dṛṣṭenaiva viṣāṇādinā liṅgena gavayasya vyavahāraṃ pravartayatītyanumānameva na pramāṇāntaram / 'itiha vai vaiśravaṇaḥ';
GSP31jaymangu:108: iti nipātasamudāya upadeśapāramparye vartete / itiha evaitihyam / svārthe yañ / 'nāstīha ghaṭo 'nupalambhāt';
GSP31jaymangu:110: sa ca pratyakṣapramāṇasiddhatvānna pramāṇāntaram / 'māṣaḥ prastha ityukte catvāraḥ kuḍapā itīdamapi sambhavati';
GSP31jaymangu:111_0: ityayaṃ sambhavaḥ / tatra samudāyaliṅgāvayavaliṅginaḥ paricchedādanumānameva / avayavaissamudāyasyārabdhatvāt
GSP31jaymangu:111_1: kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ / 'devadatto divā na bhuṅkte balavāṃścetyukta arthādrātrau bhuṅkte';
GSP31jaymangu:112: ityarthāpattiḥ / tata eva rātrau tasya pratītiranumānānna bhidyate / idameva cānyathānupapattirityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:124: adhyavasāyo buddhiḥ / śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu yathākramaṃ śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇendriyadvāreṇa viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānā yā buddhirutpadyate tad dṛṣṭam,
GSP31jaymangu:127: arthavyatirekīndriyavyatirekī ceti / tatra dūrāt kvacidāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā devadattasārūpyaṃ vyapadiśati devadatto 'yamiti yā buddhirutpadyate tatsavikalpam,
GSP31jaymangu:133_1: pūrvavadanumānam / pūrvaṃ liṅgamasyāstīti pūrvavat / yathonnatajaladharaṃ dṛṣṭvā
GSP31jaymangu:134: yasyāḥ kaluṣodakaṃ śeṣaṃ liṅgamiti / varttamānārthasādhanāya sāmānyatodṛṣṭam- sāmānyena liṅgaliṅgidṛṣṭatvāt / yathā devadattasya gatipūrvikā deśāntaraprāptirdṛṣṭā,
GSP31jaymangu:137: iti / trividhamanumānam / kadācilliṅgapūrvakaṃ kadācilliṅgipūrvakaṃ loke dṛśyate / tadyathā- śrāvyeṇa virutena kadācitkokilo 'numīyate,
GSP31jaymangu:138_0: kadācitkokilaṃ liṅginaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrāvyeṇāpi virutenāsya bhavitavyamiti tayorgamyagamakatvaṃ
GSP31jaymangu:138_1: sati sambandhe / sambandhāśca sapta- tatra svasvāmibhāvasambandho yathā rājapuruṣayoḥ
GSP31jaymangu:138_2: kadācitpuruṣeṇa rājā rājñā vā puruṣaḥ / evaṃ prakṛtivikārasambandho yathā yavasaktoḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:138_3: kāryakāraṇasambandho yathā dhenuvatsayoḥ / pātrapātrikasambandho yathā parivṛṭtriviṣṭabdhayoḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:138_4: sāhacaryasambandho yathā cakravākayoḥ / pratidvandvisambandho yathā śītoṣṇayoḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:138_5: tatraikasya bhāve 'nyābhāvaḥ pratīyate / nimittanaimittikasambandho yathā bhojyabhojakayoriti /
GSP31jaymangu:141: nirvairaḥ pūjitaḥ sadbhirāpto jñeyaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:144: paratra svabodhasadṛśabodhāntarotpattaye śabdenopadiśyate / yadanyavacanaṃ so na plavate (?)
GSP31jaymangu:149: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ kaḥ kasya viṣaya ityata āha-
GSP31jaymangu:154: atyantaparokṣaṃ ceti / tatra yatsāmānyatodṛṣṭamanumānaṃ tasmādatīndriyāṇāṃ parokṣāṇāṃ prasiddhirasti / tanniścayaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:157: tadatyantaparokṣatvādāgamātsiddham / yathā svargāpavargāviti / pratyakṣe tu prameye dṛṣṭameva vyāpriyata ityarthāduktam // 6 //
GSP31jaymangu:168: iti / atiśabdo 'trāpi yojanīyaḥ / atisāmīpyāditi / yathā cakṣuḥsthasyāñjanasya / ubhayatrāpi deśadoṣakṛtānupalabdhiḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:172_1: ubhayatrāpīndriyadoṣādanupalabdhiḥ / manaso 'pīndriyatvād bhedenopādānaṃ tu manasaḥ prādhānyārtham //
GSP31jaymangu:175: 'vyavadhānāt'; iti / yavanikādibhistirodhānāt sthūlā apyavikṛṣṭā ghaṭādayo nopalabhyante //
GSP31jaymangu:178: iti / sadṛśānāṃ rāśīkaraṇāt dhānyarāśau hyeko dhānyaguḍakaḥ prakṣipto na dṛśyate / triṣvapyarthāntaradoṣādanupalabdhiḥ / natveta anupalabhyamānā na santi // 7 //
GSP31jaymangu:184: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtisarūpaṃ virūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
GSP31jaymangu:186: ityādi / prakārāntarābhāvāt sūkṣmatvātsatorapi tayoranupalabdhiḥ / nanvabhāvādeva kasmādanupalabdhirna bhavati / yathā ghaṭasyotpatteḥ prāk mṛt śarādiṣu.... tasya pradhvaṃsābhāvāt,
GSP31jaymangu:189: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tau sta iti gamyata ityāha- 'kāryatastadupalabdheḥ';
GSP31jaymangu:190: iti / yadyapyatrobhayaṃ prakrāntaṃ tathāpi tacchabdena pradhānaṃ nirdiśyate / pradhānasyāstitvapratipattiḥ kāryādityarthaḥ / puruṣasyāstitvapratipattau hetuṃ vakṣyati //
GSP31jaymangu:192: iti / mahān buddhiḥ sa ādiryasya tanmahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ kāryamasti / tat pradhānam,
GSP31jaymangu:196: iti / tadvyaktaṃ prakṛteḥ pradhānasya sadṛśamasadṛśaṃ cetyarthaḥ / etaduttaratra yojayiṣyate // 8 //
GSP31jaymangu:200: tatkāryaṃ kāraṇādutpadyamānaṃ sadutpadyate, kimasat, kiṃ vā sadasaditi?
GSP31jaymangu:204: 'asadakaraṇāt'; ityādi / iha loke asataḥ karaṇaṃ nāsti,
GSP31jaymangu:205: yathā śaśaviṣāṇādīnām / yadeva sat ghaṭādidravyaṃ tadeva mṛtpiṇḍādinā kāraṇaviśeṣeṇa kriyate, nāsat //
GSP31jaymangu:206: 'upādānagrahaṇāt'; iti / iha yadarthaṃ yadupādīyate tasya tadupādānaṃ kāraṇam,
GSP31jaymangu:208_0: dadhnaḥ kṣīram / atra tailaṃ dadhi ca yadi na syāt kathaṃ tasyopādānasya grahaṇaṃ
GSP31jaymangu:208_1: tadarthibhiḥ kriyate / tasmādupādānasaṃgrahāt sadeva kāryam / anyathā sikatāsalilayorapi grahaṇaṃ syāt //
GSP31jaymangu:210: iti / yadyasatkāryaṃ bhavet tadā sarvasya sarvatra sambhavaḥ syāt / na caivam / tasmātsadeva kāryam //
GSP31jaymangu:212: iti śaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāśaktamityevamapyavagantavyam / anyathopahataśaktarbījāṅkurotpattiprasaṅgaḥ / śaktaśca ko bhavitumarhati,
GSP31jaymangu:213: yaḥ śaktimān / tasya śaktimataḥ śakyasya karaṇāt,
GSP31jaymangu:214: śakanīyasya kāryasyotpādanādityarthaḥ / evaṃ ca tacchakanīyaṃ yadi kāraṇe śaktirūpeṇāvasthitaṃ syāt / tasmātsadevotpadyate nāsat //
GSP31jaymangu:216_0: iti / kāraṇasya sattvādityarthaḥ / yadyasatkāryamutpadyate kimiti kāraṇabhāvena kāryasya
GSP31jaymangu:216_1: bhāvo bhavati / bhavati ca / tasmācchaktirūpeṇāvasthitamiti gamyate / athavā- kāraṇabhāvāditi
GSP31jaymangu:219: asatsvabhāvebhyo hyutpādyetetyevaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ sadevotpadyata iti siddhāntaḥ // 9 //
GSP31jaymangu:223: evaṃ mahadādikāryaṃ sadevotpadyata iti vyavasthāpya prakṛtevirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca darśayati / tatra prakṛtervirūpamadhikṛtyāha-
GSP31jaymangu:226: 'hetumat'; ityādi / vyaktaṃ mahadādibhūtaparyantam / avyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ tatra vyaktaṃ hetumat,
GSP31jaymangu:227: yathāsvaṃ kāraṇebhya utpadyamānatvāt / tatra pradhānādutpadyamāno mahān hetumān,
GSP31jaymangu:233: kāraṇebhya utpannatvāt ghaṭādivat / kāraṇāni ca prāguktānyeva / viparītamavyaktaṃ nityamityarthaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:235: avyāpi vyaktaṃ prādeśikamityarthaḥ / daivaṃ mānuṣaṃ tairyagyonaṃ ca,
GSP31jaymangu:239: na kriyāmātram / mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ vyaktaṃ devādi saṃsaratītyarthaḥ / viparītamavyaktam,
GSP31jaymangu:240: asaṃsāri / triṣu lokeṣu sthitatvānna saṃsarati / na punaḥ kriyaiva nāstīti niṣkriyam,
GSP31jaymangu:246: iti / yadyasmādutpannaṃ mahadādi vyaktaṃ tadeva tadāśritaṃ nānyat / utpannamanyadāśritamiti darśanārthaṃ vacanam,
GSP31jaymangu:250: na liṅgyate kiñcidaneneti / athavā layaṃ gacchatīti liṅgam /
GSP31jaymangu:251: pralayakāle hyākāśādayaḥ pañca yathākramaṃ śabdāditanmātreṣu līyante,
GSP31jaymangu:257: iti / śabdādayo 'vayavā ucyante / tairādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ ca vyaktaṃ yuktam / viparītamavyaktam, tairayuktatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:258_0: paratantram / na svatantram / yadasmādutpadyate tadevānuruddhya svakāryaṃ janayati
GSP31jaymangu:258_1: na tadvyatirekeṇeti darśanārtham / anyathā hetumadityanenaiva paratantratvaṃ prasiddhameva / viparītamavyaktam,
GSP31jaymangu:265: vyaktaṃ, tathā pradhānam, tadviparītastathā ca pumān // ISk_11 //
GSP31jaymangu:267: ityādi / trayassattvādayo guṇā yasya tattriguṇaṃ vyaktam / tathā pradhānamapi triguṇaṃ tatsvabhāvatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:269: acetanatvāt / yadvā guṇebhyastasya pṛthaktvābhāvādaviveki / tathā pradhānamapi //
GSP31jaymangu:271: acetanaṃ vyaktam, sukhaduḥkhamohānna vedayatītyarthaḥ / tathā pradhānamapi //
GSP31jaymangu:273: iti / prasavo dharmo 'syāstīti prasavadharmi vyaktam / tathā pradhānamapi / dvayorapi prasavadharmitvam //
GSP31jaymangu:275: mahato 'ṅkāra ityādinā svakāryotpādanadharmatvādyathā vyaktāvyaktayorvairūpyaṃ sārūpyaṃ ca,
GSP31jaymangu:276: tathā kiṃ puruṣasya vāpītyāha- 'tadviparītastathā ca pumān';
GSP31jaymangu:278: atra pūrvasyā āryāyā artho yojyate / hetumadvyaktam,
GSP31jaymangu:281: anityaṃ vyaktam, nityamavyaktam / puruṣo nityaḥ, kutaścidanutpannatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:283: vyāpyavyaktam / puruṣo 'pi vyāpī yadā prakṛtyā muktaḥ / yuktaścet,
GSP31jaymangu:284: vyaktena sadṛśo na pradhānena / hi sarvadā devādiṣu pravartate //
GSP31jaymangu:285: sakriyaṃ vyaktam, niṣkriyamavyaktam, asaṃsāritvāt / puruṣo 'pi niṣkriyaḥ, kartṛtvābhāvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:287: ekamavyaktam / puruṣo 'neko bahutvāt / tasya bahutvaṃ pratipādayiṣyati / pradhānenātra vaisādṛśyaṃ tasyaikatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:290: aliṅgamavyaktam / puruṣo 'pyaliṅgaḥ / na kiṃcidanena liṅgyate na vāyaṃ kadācillīyate 'nutpannatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:291: sāvayavaṃ vyaktam, niravayavamavyaktam / puruṣo 'pi niravayavaḥ śabdādibhirayuktatvāt /
GSP31jaymangu:292: paratantraṃ vyaktam, svatantramavyaktam / puruṣo 'pi svatantraḥ, kutaścidanutpannatvāt //

GSP31jaymangu:378_0: iti / kāraṇasya yo guṇaḥ sa ātmā svabhāvo yasya tattathoktam / tasya svabhāvastattvam /

GSP31jaymangu:389_0: parimāṇācca / bhedānāṃ parimitatvādityarthaḥ / yena ca parimitāsteṣāmekaḥ saṃsargī
GSP31jaymangu:389_3: tasmādeteṣāmekena saṃsargiṇā bhavitavyam / yatraiṣāṃ saṃsargastadavyaktaṃ kāraṇamastīti

GSP31jaymangu:392: yathā vā śarāvādīnāṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ / evameṣāmapi bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānugatatvādekena tathāvidhena bhavitavyam / ya eṣāṃ samudāyastatpradhānamiti sāmānyatodṛṣṭam /
GSP31jaymangu:394_0: iti / iha kulālādiśaktipūrvikā ghaṭādīnāṃ pravṛttirdṛṣṭā nāśaktipūrvikā / eṣāmapi
GSP31jaymangu:394_1: bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ pravṛttirdṛśyate / tataśca prāk ca pravṛtterjanitayā śaktyā bhavitavyam /

GSP31jaymangu:471: badhire vā tathā syuḥ / na caivam,

GSP31jaymangu:505: ityādi / tena puruṣeṇa yaḥ saṃyogastasmādacetanaṃ cetanāvadiva bhavati / yathāgnisaṃyogāllohamaṇirityucyate / liṅgaṃ mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ vakṣyati //
GSP31jaymangu:506: yadi tadeva triguṇātmakaṃ kartṛ na pumān,

GSP31jaymangu:517: nanu pradhānapuruṣayoḥ kiṃ (kartṛtvaṃ) caitanyārthameva saṃyogaḥ, kiṃ vānyārthamapītyāha-

GSP31jaymangu:523_0: / dṛṣṭvā sa sarvāṃ vibhūtimanubhūya virasatvād viraktaḥ puruṣaḥ pradhānena tyajyate /
GSP31jaymangu:523_1: tyaktasya kaivalyamityato darśanārthaṃ kaivalyārthaṃ ca dvayorapi saṃyogo matsyodakavadudumbaramaśakaśca //

GSP31jaymangu:526_0: andho 'pi draṣṭradhiṣṭhānāddṛṣṭimān jātaḥ / grāmaprāptayośca tayorviyogaḥ / evaṃ
GSP31jaymangu:526_1: puruṣo niṣkriyaḥ pradhānena saṃyujya tadvibhūtidarśanāya devādiṣu saṃcarati / pradhānaṃ
GSP31jaymangu:526_2: niścetanamapi puruṣādhiṣṭhānāccetanāvadiva dvayamapi sampādayati / tasmātpaṃgvandhavadubhayorapi saṃyogaḥ //

GSP31jaymangu:536_0: ityādi / prakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇamavyaktaṃ guṇasāmyaṃ tamobahulamavyākṛtamiti prakṛtiparyāyāḥ /

GSP31jaymangu:798: iti / yadā tamasvatī buddhirbhavati tadā sarvamupanītaṃ sampādayati / yadā sattvādhikā buddhirbhavati,

GSP31jaymangu:806: ete smṛtā viśeṣāḥ, śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca // ISk_38 //
GSP31jaymangu:808: ityādi / sūkṣmaviṣayāstanmātrāṇītyucyante / tairna kaścidviśiṣyata ityaviśeṣāḥ / yathā sūkṣmatṛṇāgrāvasthitaṃ tejo na lakṣyate,
GSP31jaymangu:811: 'tebhyo bhūtāni pañca pañcabhyaḥ'; iti / tanmātrebhyaḥ pañca mahābhūtānyutpadyante //
GSP31jaymangu:813: iti / śabdatanmātrādekaguṇamākāśamutpadyate / evaṃ sparśāditanmātrād dvitricatuḥpañcaguṇā vāyvādaya utpadyante / taiśca tanmātrāṇi / viśiṣyanta iti viśeṣāḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:814: te ca kiṃsvarūpā ityāha- 'śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca'; iti / śāntāḥ sukhapradāha ghorā duḥkhapradāḥ,

GSP31jaymangu:822: 'sūkṣmāḥ'; ityādi / ye sūkṣmāstanmātralakṣaṇāḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ śarīrasyāśrayatāṃ gatāste 'pi viśeṣāḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:825: iti / mātāpitṛjāḥ ṣaṭ / tatra mātṛto lomalohitamāṃsāni pitṛtaḥ snāyvasthimajjānaḥ / te 'pi viśeṣāḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:826: taiḥ sthūlaśarīrasya ṣaṭkośikasyārabdhatvāt / ete dvividhā viśeṣā ādhyātmikāḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:828: iti / yāni mahābhūtāni bāhyāni śāntaghoramūḍhānyuktāni tāni sthūlaśarīrasyāvakāśavyūhanapattikledanadhāraṇakartṛtvena prakṛṣṭabhūtānyucynte / taiḥ saha trayo viśeṣāḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:829: 'sūkṣmāsteṣāṃ niyatā mātāpitṛjā nivartante'; iti / sūkṣmaśarīraniyataṃ jñānaprāpteḥ prāk,

GSP31jaymangu:845: 'nirupabhogam'; iti / bāhyena sthūlaśarīreṇa vikalatvādviṣayabhogasamarthaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:852: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā cchāyā /

GSP31jaymangu:861: / na saṃsarati / na ca nirādhāreṇa karaṇena puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ sambhavati / puruṣo 'pi niṣkriyatvānna saṃsarati // 41 //

GSP31jaymangu:1086_2: pakṣiṇaḥ / sarpādayaḥ kṛmyantāḥ sarīsṛpāḥ / vṛkṣādayaḥ sthūṇāntāḥ sthāvarā iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1088: iti / manuṣyāṇāmayaṃ mānuṣyaḥ / evaṃvidhasaṃsthānasyaikavidhatvāt / brāhmādibhedo 'pi sattvarajastamasāṃ vikalpāt kālavyavahāranimittam //
GSP31jaymangu:1090: - jarāyujāṇḍajoṣmajodbhijjākhyāścatvāro bhedāḥ śāstrāntare draṣṭavyāḥ / udbhijjāḥ sthāvarāḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1091: 'bhautikaḥ sargaḥ'; iti / bhūteṣu bhavo bhautikaḥ, lokotpāda ityarthaḥ / sa ca dvividhaḥ // 53 //
GSP31jaymangu:1095: sthūlaśarīre sattvayi kaścideva kvacidadhikyena vartata iti darśayannāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1098: 'ūrdhvam'; ityādi / brahmā ādiryasya sargasya stambaśca tṛṇaviṭapaparyantaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1099: sa brahmādistambaparyantaḥ sargaḥ / sa ūrdhvaḥ sattvaviśālaḥ / ūrdhvaṃ devalokastasyotkṛṣṭatvāt tatra sāttvika ityarthaḥ / devalokasya sattvabahulatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:1102: 'madhye rajoviśālaḥ'; iti / manuṣyaloke madhye / uttarādharabhāvāt tatra duḥkhabahulatvāt // 54 //
GSP31jaymangu:1107: tadeva tarhi sāṃsārikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vāpnoti,
GSP31jaymangu:1109: tatra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1111: 'tatra'; ityādi / teṣu lokeṣu jarāmaraṇakṛtamiti caturduḥkhopalakṣaṇārtham / garbhaduḥkham,
GSP31jaymangu:1114_0: maraṇaduḥkhamiti / tatra mātuḥ kukṣau andhatamasīva praviṣṭasya saṅkucanaprasāraṇaduḥkhaṃ
GSP31jaymangu:1114_2: jarāduḥkham / maraṇāvasthāyāṃ sthūlaśarīraṃ tyajato maraṇaduḥkham / etattvādhyātmikaṃ
GSP31jaymangu:1114_3: duḥkhe 'ntarbhūtamaprītaduḥkhaṃ buddhyādhyavasitaṃ puruṣaḥ prāpnoti tasya cetanatvāt,
GSP31jaymangu:1117_0: iti / yāvalliṅgasyāvinivṛttistāvadityarthaḥ / tasya ca nivṛttiḥ pradhānapuruṣāntarajñānāt /
GSP31jaymangu:1117_1: yataścaivaṃ tasmādduḥkhaṃ svabhāvena / liṅgagarbhādyavasthāsu svabhāvato duḥkhamityarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1123: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā /
GSP31jaymangu:1125: puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yadbhūtaṃ yacca bhavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1127: svabhāvikamevedaṃ sarvaṃ jagannahi marudādayaḥ kenacit kriyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1130: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
GSP31jaymangu:1131: 'ityeṣa prakṛtikṛtaḥ'; ityādi / ārabhyata ityārambhaḥ / prakṛtikṛta iti pradhānakṛtaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1133: tacca triguṇāyā eva prakṛterutpadyate / napai svabhāvikam,
GSP31jaymangu:1136_0: iti / buddhirādiryasyārambhasya / bhūtāni lokatraye yānyabhinnasaṃsthānāni sthūlaśarīrākhyāni /
GSP31jaymangu:1136_1: viṣayāśca / bāhyāśca viṣayāḥ sūkṣmāḥ sthūlāḥ / te paryante 'vasāne yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1139_0: puruṣāṇāṃ bahutvāt / bhāvasarge bhūtasarge cāneka iti darśayati / tathāhi mokṣārthaṃ
GSP31jaymangu:1139_1: viṣayopabhogārthaṃ cāyamārambha iti draṣṭavyam / pradhānena hi puruṣārthaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1139_2: sa ca dvividhaḥ / viṣayopabhogaḥ kaivalyaṃ ca / tadubhayaṃ kṛtvā nivartata iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1141: iti / yaḥ kaścit devadattasvārtha eva parārtho rahititaṃ pravartate na parastapastakaroti (?)
GSP31jaymangu:1147: pradhānasyācetanatvātkathaṃ lokatraye puruṣaṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyojya dhyānena vipramocya nivarteta / kathamevaṃvidhā pravṛttiḥ / nāyaṃ niyamaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1151: 'vatsavivṛddhinimittam'; ityādi / vatsasya vivṛddhiḥ puṣṭiḥ / tasyā nimittam //
GSP31jaymangu:1152: 'kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttirajñasya'; iti / acetanasya / yathā tṛṇadikamacetanaṃ gavāśitaṃ pītaṃ ca,
GSP31jaymangu:1154: kṣīrātmanā pariṇamati kṛtārthaṃ ca nivartata iti // 57 //
GSP31jaymangu:1160: tat kiṃ tena pravṛttena? tathā cāhuḥ -
GSP31jaymangu:1161: madhvarthaṃ prasthitaḥ kaścid grāmābhyāśe tu mākṣikam /
GSP31jaymangu:1162: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1167: tadvat pralayāvasthāyāṃ puruṣo 'pi mokṣanimittaṃ yadautsukyaṃ tannivṛttaye pravartayetpradhānamiti // 58 //
GSP31jaymangu:1172: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate narttakī yathā nṛttāt /
GSP31jaymangu:1173: puruṣasya tathā '; 'tmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ // ISk_59 //
GSP31jaymangu:1175: ityādi / nṛtyatīti narttakī / sā tathā raṅgasya nṛttaṃ darśayitvā tasmānnṛttānnivartate viramati,
GSP31jaymangu:1177: tathā puruṣasyātmānaṃ saṃprakāśya devādibhāvarūpaṃ gatā nivartate prakṛtiḥ pradhānamityarthaḥ // 59 //
GSP31jaymangu:1181: nanu ca naṭī raṅgāt svārthaṃ sādhayati, prakṛtestu puruṣārthaḥ svārtho yenaivamācarayatītyāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1189: nāsau tāmityāha - '; guṇavatyaguṇasya sataḥ'; iti / guṇasattvātprakṛtiḥ sakriyā,
GSP31jaymangu:1190: nirguṇatvāt puruṣo niṣkriya iti / tasyārthamapārthakaṃ carati / tasya puṃso 'rtho dvividhaḥ- viṣayopabhogaḥ kaivalyaṃ ca / tannirarthakaṃ karoti,
GSP31jaymangu:1195: tathāhi - guṇānāṃ sāmyāvasthā prakṛtiḥ / kutaśca sā na sarvātmanā '; 'tmānaṃ prakāśayati,
GSP31jaymangu:1196: pumānapi na sarvathā paśyati ? tathā cāhuḥ-
GSP31jaymangu:1198: yattu dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaṃ tanmāyāvastu tucchakam // iti / atrāha -
GSP31jaymangu:1199: prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcidastīti me matirbhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1200: yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punarna darśanamupaiti puruṣasya // ISk_61 //
GSP31jaymangu:1202: ityādi / sukumārataramiti sūkṣmataramitarat / etaduktaṃ bhavati- prāgvyaktātmanā prakāśayati na tvavyaktātmanāpi,
GSP31jaymangu:1203: yena jñānāvasthāyāṃ prakṛtermatirbhavati mama sūkṣmataraṃ na kiñcidaparamasti yaddraṣṭavyaṃ puruṣeṇa //
GSP31jaymangu:1211: tasmānna puruṣasya bandho nāpi saṃsaraṇaṃ mokṣo vetyāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1212: tasmānna badhyate 'ddhā na mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
GSP31jaymangu:1213: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ // ISk_62 //
GSP31jaymangu:1215: ityādi / bandhābhāvānna badhyate / puruṣasyāpi kāryatvādbandho nāsti / na vimucyate tasyā bandhanāt / nāpi saṃsarati niṣkriyatvāt / kaściditi puruṣa ityarthaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1216: kasya tarhi bandhādaya ityāha- saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca prakṛtiriti / nanu ca tasyāḥ sukumāratvādbandhādayo na sambhavantyevetyatrāha- nānāśrayeṣurabhivajyate (?)
GSP31jaymangu:1226_0: / jñānaṃ tyaktvā te ca prakṛterātmabhūtāḥ / saivātmanaiva puruṣārthaṃ pratyātmānaṃ
GSP31jaymangu:1226_1: mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ liṅgaṃ badhnāti / bandhaśca trividhaḥ / tacca liṅgaṃ bhāvādibhiradhivāsitamarthameva /
GSP31jaymangu:1227: 'saiva ca'; iti / prakṛtiḥ puruṣārthaṃ prati kaivalyārthaṃ vimocayatyātmānam //
GSP31jaymangu:1229_0: iti / ekaṃ ca tadrūpaṃ ceti / jñānākhyena rūpeṇetyarthaḥ / yaṃ puruṣamapekṣya jñānamutpādayati
GSP31jaymangu:1229_1: taṃ pratyavyaktamātmānaṃ saṃharatītyarthaḥ / nahi dharmādayaḥ puruṣadharmā yastairbadhyate / nāpi saṃsarati,
GSP31jaymangu:1239: ityādi / evamiti vakṣyamāṇe yojyam / tattvāni pañcaviṃśatiḥ / teṣāṃ punaḥ punaḥ svarūpeṇābhyasanamabhyāsaḥ / yadetat sūkṣmaśarīraṃ bhautikaṃ ca tasminna bhavāmi, api tu prakṛtiḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1240: 'na me'; ityādi / na mamedamapi tu prakṛteḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1241: nāhamiti / nāpyahaṃ prakṛtirityevaṃ tattvābhyāsāt / kiṃviśiṣṭāt - aviparyayādahamityamānasaṃśayāt jñānamutpadyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1249: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavadavasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
GSP31jaymangu:1251: ityādi / yat prakṛtijñānamutpadyate taṃ prati nivṛtaḥ prasavo liṅgabhūtasargākhyo yasyāḥ prakṛteḥ sa tathoktā / prasavanivṛttyā vā yo viṣayo viṣayebhyo nivartate tadvaśāt,
GSP31jaymangu:1252: saptabhyo rūpebhyo dharmādibhyo nivṛttā prakṛtirbhavati / bhāvasaṃsargo 'pi yasyā nivartata ityarthaḥ / tāmevaṃvidhāmavyaktarūpāṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1254: iti / yathā prekṣakaḥ pravarttitanṛttamupasaṃhṛtanṛttāṃ ca narttakīṃ paśyati,
GSP31jaymangu:1256: 'svasthaḥ'; iti / ātmani sthito na prakṛtisthaḥ, tataḥ prakṛternivṛttatvāt // 65 //
GSP31jaymangu:1260: nanu ca yadi prakṛtirgarbhabhūḥpuruṣaṃ prati nivṛttaprasavā,
GSP31jaymangu:1261: tasyāśca prakṛtestadānīṃ sarvagatatvādastyeva saṃyogastatkimiti punaḥ śarīrotpattirna bhavatītyāha -
GSP31jaymangu:1263: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya // ISk_66 //
GSP31jaymangu:1267: iti / aparā prakṛtiruparatā nivṛttaprasavā / sarvathā 'hamanena dṛṣṭeti //
GSP31jaymangu:1268_0: tataśca saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya / viṣayopabhogārthaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1268_1: tasminneva caritārthatvāt na punaḥ sargamārabhate / nahi naṭī raṅge prekṣakairnirākāṃkṣitaṃ
GSP31jaymangu:1272: yadyātmajñānāt kaivalyaprāptiḥ, tadanantarameva śarīraṃ kasmānna nivartata ityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1277: tasyāmakāraṇaprāptāveva taduktaṃ bhavati / samyak jñānādhigamātteṣāṃ dharmādīnāmagnidagdhabījavadaśaktatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:1278_1: kulālavyāpāre nivṛtte 'pi vegavaśāt kiyantamapi kālaṃ cakrabhramastiṣṭhati tathā
GSP31jaymangu:1286: ityādi / liṅgabhautikaśarīre pṛthagbhūte yathā saṃbhūte layaṃ gati teṣvityarthaḥ (?) //
GSP31jaymangu:1288: iti / pradhānaṃ liṅgātmanā pariṇataṃ nivartate / nivṛttāvubhayaṃ kaivalyamāpnoti //
GSP31jaymangu:1290: iti / tatrātmajñānotpādādavaśyaṃbhāvi kaivalyamityaikāntikam / satyapi tayoḥ saṃyoge prayojanābhāvānna punaḥ sarga ityātyantikamiti // 68 //
GSP31jaymangu:1298: ityādi / puruṣārthaṃ jñānaṃ ceti puruṣārthajñānam / yadidaṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānaṃ tatpradhānam,
GSP31jaymangu:1299: puruṣārthamokṣo 'nena prāpyata iti kṛtvā / guhyamidamaprakāśyam / sādhujanādanyasmai na deyamityarthaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1302_0: iti / yatra jñāne bhūtānāṃ brahmādistambaparyantānāṃ sthityādayo vyavasthāpyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1302_1: tatrotpannānāṃ prabandhenāvasthānaṃ sthitiḥ / sā ca triṣu sthāneṣu daivamānuṣatairyagyoneṣu
GSP31jaymangu:1302_2: utpattiḥ sṛṣṭapradhānāt yāvat tanmātrebhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtāni / sṛṣṭyupasaṃhāre mahāpralayaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1303: sarvo 'pyutkrameṇa / tadyathā pṛthivyādayastanmātrādiṣu līyante yāvatpradhānamiti / tena pañcaviṃśatitattvavyatiriktaṃ nāstītyetaduktam // 69 //
GSP31jaymangu:1309: āsurirapi pañcaśikhāya, tena ca bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
GSP31jaymangu:1314_0: iti / kapilasya mahāmuneḥ sahotpannāścatvāro dharmādayaḥ / tatra jñānākhyena bhāvenāndhe
GSP31jaymangu:1314_1: tamasi vartamānaṃ jagat dṛṣṭavato muneḥ karuṇotpannā / tayā ca preryamāṇa āsuriṃ
GSP31jaymangu:1316: iti / punarvarṣasahasre pūrṇe taṃ gatvā tathovāca / so 'pi 'bhagavan na rame 'ham';
GSP31jaymangu:1319: ityasāvuktaḥ / sa tu pradipadya gṛhasthadharmaṃ tyaktvā pravrajitaḥ / tasmai śiṣyāyānukampayā saṃkṣipya dattavān / 'tama eva khalvidamāsīt';
GSP31jaymangu:1320: / tasmiṃstamasi kṣetrajña eva prathamaḥ / tamaḥ pradhānam,
GSP31jaymangu:1321: kṣetrajñaḥ puruṣa ucyate / āsurirapi tadeva saṃkṣiptaṃ pañcaśikhāya svaśiṣyāyānukampayā pradadau //
GSP31jaymangu:1323: iti / pañcaśikhena muninā bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram / ṣaṣṭitantrākhyaṃ ṣaṣṭikhaṇḍaṃ kṛtamiti / tatraiva hi ṣaṣṭirarthā vyākhyātāḥ // 70 //
GSP31jaymangu:1327: nanu ca ṣaṣṭitantramevāstu kiṃ saptatyeti svaśāstrakaraṇaprayojanamāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1331: īśvarakṛṣṇanāmānaṃ parivrājakamityanayā śiṣyaparamparayā / iti jñānamayarūpeṇāgataṃ siddhāntaṃ ṣaṣṭitantram / samyagvijñāya saṃkṣiptaṃ ṣaṣṭitantram,
GSP31jaymangu:1341: atra ṣaṣṭitantre bahavo 'rthāḥ, te 'tra noktā ityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1346: ityādinā granthena ya uktāste kṛtsnasya ṣaṣṭitantrasyāpi //
GSP31jaymangu:1347: kintu 'ākhyāyikāvirahitāḥ paravādavivarjitāḥ śuddhāḥ'; iti / ākhyāyikā ākhyānam,
GSP31jaymangu:1348: tadvirahitāḥ / paracodyaṃ tena vivarjitāḥ / śuddhāḥ kevalāḥ / paraṃ bandhamokṣopayogino 'rthāḥ darśitā iti tasmāt sampūrṇeyaṃ saptatiriti // 72 //
